{/* Introduction */}

Hello! I'm {personalInfo.name}

I'm a passionate 4th year Computer Science Engineering student at Saraswati Higher Education College (AKTU University). My journey in technology began with curiosity and has evolved into a deep passion for creating innovative digital solutions.

During my 60-day internship at Softpro, I mastered the MERN stack and earned an A+ grade for my exceptional performance. This experience equipped me with real-world development skills and industry best practices.

I believe in the power of technology to solve complex problems and create meaningful impact. My goal is to continue growing as a developer while contributing to projects that make a difference.
